description:
Haru and his friends enjoy writing New Year`s resolutions. Meanwhile, out in the city, chaos breaks out when puzzle games start appearing on screen displays! The screens won`t work unless you solve the puzzle... what do we do?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Machijuu ga Puzzle Game!? Puzzlemon Daibousou!
The City-Wide Puzzle Game?! Puzzlemon`s Rampage!
街中がパズルゲーム!? パズルモン大暴走!
